title: "For Your Pleasure" funky 70s Art Deco-style sans
content:
I set this sample myself using the MyFonts online sampler, but can I find this font again? - can I hell!

I've posted this on MyFonts Forum twice, and got zip.

I've looked through 1000s of fonts tagged sans, 1970s etc. No luck.

Can anyone help. REMEMBER it is an available font otherwise those them there words I couldn't have set.

Thanks, p

| --- | --- |

author: Paul Hetherington

comments.content: Is this more nouveau or more deco? Not that I know what it is....
